COLN.MX.summary: Colonial is a Spanish listed REIT company (SOCIMI), leader in the European Prime office market with presence in the main business areas of Barcelona, Madrid and Paris with a prime office portfolio of more than one million of sqm of GLA and assets under management with a value of more than Â12bn.

YCOR.MC.summary: Corona Patrimonial SOCIMI, S.A.U., a real estate investment trust, engages in the acquisition, development, and rental of urban real estate assets in Spain. It acquires and leases office buildings located in Madrid, Alcobendas, and Barcelona. The company is based in Barcelona, Spain.
